question: Five Pillars of Islam are five duties.
Friday prayer in mosque is called Jumu'ah.
Tawheed refers to unity of God.
Angel Gabriel brought revelation to Muhammad.
Jinn are beings made from fire in Islam.
Night of Power is when Qur'an was revealed.
Prophet Muhammad was born in Mecca.
Muslims face Mecca direction during prayer.
Eid al-Fitr celebrates end of Ramadan.
Zakat is the obligation to give charity.
Imam's role includes preaching and leading prayer.
Ablution is ritual purification before prayer.
Mosque is a place of worship.
Islamic calendar is based on Hijra.
Muslims perform prayer five times daily.
Islam is based on the Qur'an.
